title.rendered: How to Rank Your Website on Google: 6 Easy Steps to #1 (for SEO)

content.rendered:
An inside look at my exact process for creating content that is keyword-rich.  I always prepare guideline and a gameplay before creating this content.  I highly recommend that you restructure your SEO process to ensure success and higher rankings and follow my lead.

If you guys have any questions about today’s video don’t hesitate to ask in the comments below.

If you missed yesterday’s video please view “Keyword Research: Step-by-Step Guide (for SEO)” : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EZzp_…

My Top 6 Steps to Ranking Keywords in 2020

1. How to create Keyword-Rich Content
2. Understanding the difference in Keywords: Sales vs. Education
3. Visit your Competitors
4. Document your Findings (Chart)
5. Create Guidelines and a Game Plan
6. Time to Create Content!

Want to hire the best SEO company in Toronto? Send us an email to nerd@anerdsworld.com today!

All the best,

Chris A. Hughes
